issue.title: NotImplemented: serializing ExampleFunctionOptionsType to StructScalar
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15443](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15443). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
when running example compute_register_example, it report an exception:

 

NotImplemented: serializing ExampleFunctionOptionsType to StructScalar
